column4: i ran "sudo shutdown -F -r now" but i still have problems with the file system: ls -hal of one of my /usr/lib directories contains entries like this: "??????????   ? ?    ?       ?                ? libgstwavparse.so" when it should be like "-rw-r--r--   1 root root  25K 2008-03-11 06:27 libgstwildmidi.so"
